abstract: The United Food and Commercial Workers pledged not to try to unionize Walmart workers to avert charges that it engaged in illegal picketing.
snippet: The United Food and Commercial Workers pledged not to try to unionize Walmart workers to avert charges that it engaged in illegal picketing.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s largest union of retail and grocery workers has formally pledged not to try to unionize Walmart workers, even though it helped coordinate picketing, protests and scattered strikes about wages and working conditions at the retailer last fall.

headline.main: Labor Union to Ease Walmart Picketing
headline.print_headline: Labor Union To Ease Walmart Picketing
